name: Metal Force
overview: Metal Force is a vertical shoot'em up developed by Chime for the pc 9801and published by You En Tai. The whole game has 8 levels. There are 3 kinds of power ups: 1) vulcan (wide shot) 2) Laser (strong and straight) 3) homing bullets You can switch between them. Moreover you can use a speed burst like the one in rayxanber. This a very nice shooter with good graphics and music . There is a bad dump of this game floating around, with no music. You should set the sound board to "Speak Board" in neko emulator otherwise the game could crash.
